channel.title: yearly review on Kevin Cui
channel.description: Recent content in yearly review on Kevin Cui

item.title: My Year 2017
item.description: “Habit is habit, and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed down-stairs one step at a time.” ― Mark Twain When sitting comfortably in front of the chimney and holding a cup of warm Glühwein, along with the Christmas holiday melody, we all know by heart that 2018 is almost here. At this moment, I feel warm, relax and a bit drunk.

item.title: My Year 2k16
item.description: “A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” – Lao Tzu There is a tradition in Japan since 1995: Every year, one character will be chosen as kanji of the year at Kiyomizu Temple, which represents the events of the entire year. So I choose the character of my year 2016 is Shi It means: to start, beginning. Begin to connect 01 Jan 2016: A new habit Actually it’s easy for me to build this habit.
